rows.name: Distracted by Death
rows.description: Your preoccupation with death makes you creepy. When interacting with individuals outside of the Cult, take a -10 penalty to Fellowship.

rows.name: Disturbing Visions
rows.description: You are plagued with portentous visions that you struggle to interpret. Take a -10 Penalty to Perception, but once per day you can gain a +10 bonus to any one test.

rows.name: Skeletal
rows.description: Your face and scalp draw in tightly. Take a -10 penalty to Charm, but gain a +10 bonus to Intimidate.

rows.name: Morr's Mien
rows.description: You grow taller, your hair darkens and your skin pales. You are cool to the touch. Add 1d10/2 inches to your height and increase your Willpower by 5.

rows.name: Flock of Ravens
rows.description: Ravens are always present where you go. Indoors you glimpse them through windows, and even underground you see raven cave paintings or raven-shaped rock formations with disturbing regularity. You gain +20 to Charm Animal tests towards ravens.

rows.name: Dead Eyes
rows.description: Your gaze causes others to flinch. You gain the Frightening Talent, but the GM decides who it applies to.

rows.name: Morr's Servant
rows.description: Sentient Undead shy from your presence. You have Fear 1 towards creatures with the Undead Trait. If they also possess the Construct trait, they cannot approach you.

rows.name: Enlightened
rows.description: You have gazed beyond Morr's Portal. You are completely Fearless.

rows.name: Marked by Morr
rows.description: A symbol of Morr appears as a mark somewhere on your body (roll 1d100 for Hit Location). You gain +10 bonus to Pray tests when using Miracles of Morr, and +10 bonus to Fellowship tests when dealing with other followers of Morr if they can see the mark.
